duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads all aspects of the company’s safety culture and creates awareness by demonstrating commitment to an injury-free environment through individual actions and mentoring others.
Manages and oversees company staff, subcontractors, suppliers, and programs such as Safety, Quality, and EEOC for a small project or a major portion of a larger project.
Develops work plans for subcontractors and self-performed work, and coordinates and manages the care, custody, and control of the project site.
Manages material and equipment needs for the project and supports the procurement and approval processes.
Participates in the negotiation process with the owner and architect to gain agreement for project changes.
Responsible for identifying and recruiting top talent, and for leading, supporting, and promoting a culture of diversity and inclusion within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering, or related field (Preferred)
